title: Participation in online gambling in the United Kingdom 2016 - 2018 , by age group
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing 2016, 2017, and 2018. The y axis denotes Share of respondents and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall 2016, 2017, and 2018 are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. 2018, 2. 2017, and lastly, 3. 2016.
Throughout the period, 2018 generally had the highest Share of respondents relative to others with an average of 18.77, and it reached its maximum at 25-34_year_olds with a value of 23.1.
After 2018, 2017 overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 18.6, peaking at 25-34_year_olds.
The botommost line, 2016,  has a mean of 17.52, and peaked at 35-44_year_olds.
min_summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing 2016, 2017, and 2018. The y axis denotes Share of respondents and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall 2016, 2017, and 2018 are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, 2018 mostly maintained the highest Share of respondents when compared to others with a mean value of 18.77, and it peaked at 25-34_year_olds.
Followed by 2017 which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 18.6 Share of respondents,reaching its highest point  at 25-34_year_olds with a value of 24.4.
2016 mostly had the least Share of respondents with a mean value of 17.52, which peaked at 35-44_year_olds with a value of 21.5.
